sentences.en: Entry to the show is free to members on production of their membership cards.
sentences.cn: 会员只要出示会员卡就可以免费观看演出。

sentences.en: Every club member must pay up his membership money before the end of the season.
sentences.cn: 每一位俱乐部成员必须在赛季结束以前缴清会费.

sentences.en: He has brought his membership credentials with him.
sentences.cn: 他的组织关系已经带来了.
个人会员费13英镑（无工作者7英镑）。

sentences.en: Membership fees are being increased this year.
Membership has ballooned beyond all expectations.
sentences.cn: 会员的增加比预期的要快.

sentences.en: Membership in her church youth group helped develop her political ideas.
sentences.cn: 加入教会青年团契促使她形成了自己的政治观点。

sentences.en: Membership of the ERM is not a panacea for Britain's economic problems.
sentences.cn: 加入欧洲汇率机制并不是解决英国经济问题的万灵丹。

sentences.en: Our membership may refuse to discuss the matter.
sentences.cn: 我们全体成员可能拒绝讨论这件事.

sentences.en: She applied for associate membership last year.
sentences.cn: 她去年申请成为准会员。

sentences.en: The European Builders Confederation has a membership of over 350,000 building companies.
sentences.cn: 欧洲建筑商联合会拥有逾35万家建筑公司会员。

sentences.en: The membership application came before the Council of Ministers in September.
sentences.cn: 会员申请书于9月提交部长会议审议。

sentences.en: The membership of the club is now 500.
sentences.cn: 目前俱乐部成员数达500人.

sentences.en: The society has a large membership.
Their membership seems to have risen to something over 10,000.
sentences.cn: 他们的会员似乎已经增加到约1万名以上。

sentences.en: There is no percolation of political ideas from the membership to the leadership.
sentences.cn: 政治观念不会从成员那里传到领导层。

sentences.en: We’re trying to increase our membership.
sentences.cn: 我们正在设法增加会员人数。

sentences.en: You should carry your membership card with you at all times.
sentences.cn: 你应该随身携带会员卡。

phrases.tran_cn: 隶属度（归属函数中的专有名词）；归属程度；会员级别

trans.tran_cn: 会员身份，成员资格/人数
trans.tran_en: when someone is a member of a club, group, or organization
